Member Function Documentation

void cAmmo::Action ( cClient *  who  )  [virtual]

Handles the actions of ammunition objects.

This function is called whenever ammunition is used or should perform an action.

Implements cObject.

void cAmmo::Assess ( cClient *  pcAssesser  )  [virtual]

Handles the assessment of ammunition objects.

This function is called whenever ammunition is assessed by a client.

Returns a Game Event (0x0000F7B0) server message of type Identify Object (0x000000C9).

Reimplemented from cObject.

cMessage cAmmo::CreatePacket (  )  [virtual]

Handles the message sent for the creation of ammunition in the world.

This function is called whenever ammunition should be created in the world for a client.

Returns:
cMessage - Returns a Create Object (0x0000F745) server message.

Implements cObject.

cMessage cAmmo::CreatePacketContainer ( DWORD  Container,
DWORD  ItemModelID 
)

Handles the message sent for the creation of ammunition in a container.

This function is called whenever ammunition should be created in the inventory of another object.

Returns:
cMessage - Returns a Create Object (0x0000F745) server message.
